Detroit Tigers corner infielder Gio Urshela is a member of the board of directors of the Christian Rivera Foundation, hoping to find a cure for DIPG.

Paris Olympics 2024: U.S. Men’s Soccer Team Loses 3-0 To France

Playing at the Olympics for the first time in 16 years, the U.S. men’s soccer team suffered a 3-0 defeat to host nation France at the Stade Velodrome in Marseille.
